Package com.jml.neural_network.layers

Interface Layer

All Known Implementing Classes:
Dense, Dropout
public interface Layer
An interface for specifying a layer for a neural network. Pre-made layers are available.

Pre-made Layers: 
     Dense
     Dropout

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    linalg.Matrix[]
    back​(linalg.Matrix previousVals, linalg.Matrix error)
    Computes the backward pass of the layer.

    forward​(linalg.Matrix inputs)
    Feeds the inputs through the layer.
    ActivationFunction
    getActivation()
    Gets the activation function for this layer.

    getBias()
    Gets the matrix representation of the bias terms for this layer.

  • Method Details

    • forward

      linalg.Matrix forward​(linalg.Matrix inputs)
      Feeds the inputs through the layer.
      Parameters:
      inputs - Input values for the layer
      Returns:
      The result of the layer applied to the values.

    • back

      linalg.Matrix[] back​(linalg.Matrix previousVals, linalg.Matrix error)
      Computes the backward pass of the layer.
      Parameters:
      previousVals - Values of the previous layer in the network (or input values for first layer).
      error - Error for this layer.
      Returns:
      Updates for weights based on the gradients of this layer.

    • updateInDim

      void updateInDim​(int inDim)
      Updates the input dimension for the layer.
      WARNING: This will zero any weight values the layer may currently be holding.
      Parameters:
      inDim - New input size for the layer.

    • getInDim

      int getInDim()
      Gets the input dimension for this layer.
      Returns:
      The input dimension of this layer.

    • getOutDim

      int getOutDim()
      Gets the output dimension for this layer.
      Returns:
      The output dimension of this layer.

    • getWeights

      linalg.Matrix getWeights()
      Gets the weights of this layer in its matrix representation.
      Returns:
      The weights of this layer.

    • setWeights

      void setWeights​(linalg.Matrix w)
      Sets the weights for this layer.
      Parameters:
      w - New weights for this layer

    • getBias

      linalg.Matrix getBias()
      Gets the matrix representation of the bias terms for this layer.
      Returns:
      The bias terms of this layer.

    • setBias

      void setBias​(linalg.Matrix b)
      Sets the bias terms for this layer.
      Parameters:
      b - New bias terms for this layer.

    • getValues

      linalg.Matrix getValues()
      Gets the node values for this layer.
      Returns:
      The node values of this layer in a matrix.

    • inspect

      String inspect()
      Gets the details of this layer as a string.
      Returns:
      A string representing the details of this layer. This may include input dimension, output dimension, and activation function depending on the layer.

    • getDetails

      String getDetails()
      Constructs a string containing this layers activation function, input/output dimension, and all parameters of the layer. Note, this will be more detailed than the getDetails() method and can result in large strings.
      Returns:
      A string containing all information, including trainable parameters needed to recreate the layer.

    • getActivation

      ActivationFunction getActivation()
      Gets the activation function for this layer.
      Returns:
      The activation function for this layer. Note, if the layer does not have an activation function this will be null.
